name: Combat Navy Marineship - Gunship Shooter
description:
Combat Navy Marineship - Gunship Shooter is Awsome attack and defence game.You as a commando is inside combat helicopter to attack on enemies on navy carrier. it's real gunship sea battle and from your helicopter you will eliminate soldiers.
How to Play:
- Touch & Drag the screen anywhere to move/rotate your gun left, right, up or down
- Aim and tap Fire button at bottom right to fire.
- For clear aim view use the Telescope for sniper target shot
- Try to shoot and kill enemy soldiers on first spot
